item.title: You Won't Believe How Easy It Is to Stop Annoying Forwarded Calls on Your iPhone Verizon!
item.description: Introduction Are you tired of receiving forwarded calls on your iPhone Verizon? Do you wish there was a way to stop them? Well, you’re in luck! It’s actually surprisingly easy to stop annoying forwarded calls on your iPhone Verizon. Definition of Forwarded Calls Forwarded calls are calls that are sent to your phone from another number. They are typically sent by telemarketers or other companies who have your number. The most annoying part about these calls is that they can show up on your phone at any time, day or night.
